name: transformingAttributes(_:_:_:)
desc: Returns an attributed string by calling a closure that transforms two attributes of a source attributed string.
declaration: func transformingAttributes<K1, K2>(_ k: K1.Type, _ k2: K2.Type, _ c: (inout AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer<K1>, inout AttributedString.SingleAttributeTransformer<K2>) -> Void) -> AttributedString where K1 : AttributedStringKey, K2 : AttributedStringKey
